long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Naro is an always-on sales knowledge assistant that helps sellers organize and surface the right content and knowledge in every customer interaction -- email, in meetings, demos, and beyond. We work right alongside the apps you use today (Gmail, Gong, Zoom, etc.) and pull in data from your CRM (Salesforce, Hubspot) and LinkedIn. We remove the need to search by unifying everything a seller might need (from slides to snippets) so teams can trust everything they need is in one platform.
